data.title: Excellent work!!
data.text: You will get high-quality massage and treatment at Living Arts Wellness. Best professionals in town. Always ready to help their patients.

data.title: Complete Wellness from the Finest Professionals
data.text: As a massage therapist myself, for almost 20 years, and a business owner as well...I can attest to the high-quality treatment you will receive from Living Arts Wellness.  You'll find a warm and inviting office, highly skilled and caring therapists, and a variety of modalities to insure your wellness is attended to and specific to your individual needs.  I have referred clients here and, I,  myself receive treatments with this group, they are who you need to see for your wellness plan.  Highly recommended!!

data.title: Top notch wellness center!
data.text: Celeste and crew offer nothing but the most professional, relaxing and healing services.  I've had colonics, massage, foot detox, taken a class on fermentation, the list goes on and on...you will not be disappointed!

data.title: Excellent for both massage and colonics
data.text: I initially went to Celeste in May of this year for a colonic after doing a detox at home.  She made the experience so comfortable and clearly is very highly qualified.  It was the best colonic I have ever received.  I found out at the time that she also did massage, so have been back twice for her amazing massages where she did some structural integration work on my body as well as deep, therapeutic massage, which I very much needed.  I will be seeing Celeste now on a regular basis as she has expert knowledge on how to help my body to heal and keep it healthy.  Celeste intuitively knows what my body needs as I have been recovering from an injury.  The location of the place is great, easy to get to, and a very calming and peaceful environment.  Everyone there is so helpful and friendly and Celeste has made me feel very welcome and at home. I highly recommend this place.

data.title: the best!
data.text: I have been seeing Mandy Westfall for deep tissue massages for a little over 5 years (I followed her here from a different location), and she also did pre-natal body work on me this past winter. She not only is a lovely person, but is incredibly talented at her craft - not to mention very well educated in physiology and body mechanics. Mandy will provide and demonstrate exercises and stretches to do on your own to help with those nagging issues all while maintaining the calm and relaxing demeanor that goes along with getting a massage. The space is a charming little house in Old Town that has been overhauled into a comforting and welcoming environment, perfect to get away for an hour or two and pamper oneself. Living Arts Wellness is a must for anyone looking to take care of their body from the inside out - or even just wanting a nice relaxing massage.

data.title: Excellent massage!
data.text: Great, relaxing massage - highly recommend! Was skeptical given obscure location, but it was awesome!

data.title: Living Wellness is an AMAZING place!
data.text:
I have been going to Living Wellness since Mandy Westfall moved her massage practice there this past year.  Going there is an awesome experience from top to bottom.  The location is easy to get to.  They have remodeled an old house into their business and it is at once professional and cozy and calming.  Mandy has been my massage therapist for a couple years now, and she is the most effective, competent, and fun therapist I have been to.

They have an easy online scheduling system, and they are typically pretty easy to get in for a session.

Without hesitation, I would strongly recommend Living Arts for all your massage therapy needs!

data.title: Living Arts Wellness leads to Wellness
data.text:
Because of my on going relationship with Celeste and regular appointments, i can testify that healing has taken place. The ease begins as soon as i walk into Living Arts, i am greeted with kind vibes and a warm environment. Whether weekly structural integration sessions or a series of colonic treatments, i feel my inner terrain balancing. Celeste knows what to treat even when i don't. Her intuitive sense coupled with her calm demeanor leave me rejuvinated and coming back for more. I highly recommend her and her staff to anyone passing through town.

Sam

data.title: Life changing!!!
data.text: My first treatments with Celeste at Living Arts were in 2007, experiencing immense relief having had a series of colonics, after suffering for years with chronic constipation. I returned this June living in months of misery in my back and hip due to a prolonged illness that caused immense pain and insomnia. Celeste did 3-4 structural integration sessions with me and much to my astonishment all of the symptoms subsided! I would not hesitate to refer anyone to her care as she is a true healer & pro; thanks again Celeste! Any questions feel free to email me at andeangold11@gmail.com

data.title: Quality care
data.text: Celeste is extremely knowlegable and understanding.  She is very caring and puts the patients needs first.  Her concern is to make you comfortable and to get the proper treatment.

data.title: A First Timer Must!
data.text: Living Arts Wellness is homey and relaxing.  The minute you step into the cozy entry you start to feel calm and comfortable.  Celeste was great at making us feel welcome and gladly answered any questions or concerns we had as I was a first time massage recipient.   As a chronic back pain sufferer, I was apprehensive about anyone manipulating my muscles or tissue around my lower back, but Celeste was an amazing expert at keeping me relaxed while addressing the issues with my back.  I can honestly say that  my back has never felt better and I would recommend Living Arts Wellness to anybody.

data.title: Fantastic!
data.text: I am an athlete and a regular visiting both Celeste and Mandy for massage and they are both highly skilled therapists that will not disappoint!

data.title: Best place for "ME TIME"
data.text:
Started off chatting with Celeste (owner), pleasant, knowledgeable, and very comfortable.
I hr. deep tissue massage (well as deep as I could take it, anyway)...Celeste worked wonders on my tired stressed body I left feeling rejuvenated, recharged, and most importantly empowered to continue to make the time for the things that feed my body and soul!

data.title: Truly health-saving treatment!
data.text: The treatments I have been receiving from Celeste have truly been health-saving treatments.  I am currently several months post-op from my second neck surgery and I don't believe my recovery process would be where it is without having received the work I have from Celeste these past few months.  As a massage therapist myself, I seek out the best, and that is absolutely what you will receive when you are in her care.  I have received treatments from Celeste for more than 10 years now, and it only gets better...if that is possible!  Thank you for your gift!

data.title: Oais for your Well-being
data.text: This is my place for health on every level of my being - physical, emotional, mental and spiritual. The refurbished house beckons you to relax and let go of all your cares. The staff is knowledgible and caring - taking time to give you what you need.  I have yet to be able to take one of their classes but look forward to in the future. I always arrive early for colonics so I can browse the great library and read some health tips. I travel from Arizona to Living Arts, it's THAT good!

data.title: greatest massage ever!
data.text: I work hard as an electrician, and so theres no doubt that I would have back pain. Since I have been going to Living Arts wellness my back has been great! I very much recommend a visit. They are very professional wonderful folks.

data.title: Colonics and Ozone Sauna
data.text: My husband and I took advantage of the colonics and the ozone sauna at Livings Arts Wellness center.  We both felt so fantasic when we were done.  Clean and healthy. Celeste is so professional and the center is calm and relaxing. We felt comfortable and well taken care of the whole time.  Really great experence.

data.title: Great massage at Living Arts Wellness
data.text:
Recently had a great massage at Living Arts Wellness.  Celeste is an excellent massage therapist and I felt very relaxed after my massage.
The office area and massage room were very pleasant  and comfortable.
They also offerred other wellness services such as nutrition and cleansing, besides all types of massage.
I plan to go back there again soon.
